title: (x) Poster by onrushdesign - Berthold Block Cd {Mike Y, Patricia}
author: lars

comments.content: Another option that still has the rounded corners, but not the wavy edges is [Gothic 821](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516225139/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/gothic-821/condensed/testdrive.html?s=ofar+rasisma&p=72)
